loan.name: El Jardín Group
loan.use: to buy fertiliser, insecticide, manure, and other farm supplies.
loan.description: Gilma, 42, is married and has three children. She has been growing coffee for around 13 years. She also makes money selling bananas. She is asking for another loan from the field partner through Kiva in order to buy fertiliser, insecticide, manure, and other farm supplies to tend to her crops. Together with Francisco, Reynaldo, and Darifrey, who are also farmers, she belongs to solidarity group “El Jardín” [The Garden].
loan.whySpecial: It helps farmers manage their cash flows and provide access to health insurance.
